summary.span: 在 Win32 窗口中呈现 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 内容。

span.span: Presents Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) content in a Win32 window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类的多个成员在 Internet 安全区域中不可用。Many members of this class are unavailable in the Internet security zone. 实现可包含[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]内容的窗口。[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] An implements a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window that can contain [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content. 窗口[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]中的内容已排列、测量和呈现, 并且与输入交互。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content in the window is arranged, measured, and rendered; and is interactive to input. 由于专用于与进行互操作, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]因此此类公开了多个低[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]级别功能。 Because the is specifically designed to interoperate with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)], this class exposes several low-level [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] features. 此类可用于执行以下操作:You can use this class to do the following: - 指定窗口样式、窗口类样式和扩展窗口样式。Specify window styles, window class styles, and extended window styles. - 挂钩窗口过程。Hook the window procedure. - 提供对窗口句柄 (HWND) 的访问权限。Provide access to the window handle (HWND). - 销毁窗口。Destroy the window. 类旨在实现常规互操作性, 并且不是作为托管的 HWND 包装设计的。The class is designed for general interoperability and is not designed as a managed HWND wrapper. 通常, 它不提供用于操作窗口或属性以检查其状态的托管方法。In general, it does not provide managed methods for manipulating the window or properties for inspecting its state. 相反, 此类通过属性提供[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]对窗口句柄 (HWND) 的访问, 可通过 PInvoke 方法将其传递到[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] , 以便操作窗口。Instead, the class provides access to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window handle (HWND) through the property, which can be passed by means of PInvoke techniques to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] in order to manipulate the window. **完成****Construction** 的许多方面只能在构造时指定。Many aspects of the can only be specified at construction time. 若要创建, 首先要创建结构并使用所需的参数填充它。To create an , first create an structure and populate it with the desired parameters. 这些参数包括:These parameters include the following: - 类、窗口和扩展窗口样式。The class, window, and extended window styles. 创建窗口后, 必须使用 PInvoke 来更改样式。You must use PInvoke to change the styles after the window is created. 创建窗口后, 不能更改所有样式。Not all styles can be changed after the window is created. 更改窗口[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]样式之前, 请参考文档。Consult the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] documentation before changing window styles. - 窗口的初始位置。The initial position of the window. - 窗口的初始大小, 其中包括是否指定大小, 或者是否应从确定的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]内容大小确定大小。The initial size of the window, which includes whether the size is specified or should be determined from the determined size of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content. - 父窗口。The parent window. - 要包含在窗口过程链中的。The to include in the window procedure chain. 如果在构造时指定了挂钩, 则它将接收窗口的所有消息。If you specify a hook at construction time, it receives all messages for the window. 可以使用在创建窗口后添加挂钩。You can use to add a hook after the window is created. - 透明度设置。The transparency settings. 可以根据[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]内容的每像素透明度, 将顶级窗口配置为与桌面上的其他窗口混合。A top-level window can be configured to blend with the other windows on the desktop according to the per-pixel transparency of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content. 若要启用此设置, 请将中的`true`属性设置为。To enable this, set the property in the to `true`. 此属性只能在构造时指定, 并且只能通过构造函数签名来指定, 并且它会施加一些限制。This property can only be specified at construction time, and only through the constructor signature, and it imposes several limitations. 填充结构后, 将其传递到的构造函数。After you populate the structure, pass it to the constructor for the . **对象生存期****Object Lifetime** 是一个常规[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]对象, 其生存期由垃圾回收器管理。 An is a regular [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] object, and its lifetime is managed by the garbage collector. 由于表示非托管资源, 因此实现。 Because the represents an unmanaged resource, implements . 如果从所有者线程调用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] , 则同步调用会立即销毁窗口。Synchronously calling immediately destroys the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window if called from the owner thread. 如果从其他线程调用, 则[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]该窗口将异步销毁。If called from another thread, the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window is destroyed asynchronously. 对于某些互操作方案, 可能需要从互操作代码中显式调用。Calling explicitly from the interoperating code might be necessary for certain interoperation scenarios. **窗口过程****Window Procedures** 类实现其自己的窗口过程。The class implements its own window procedure. 此窗口过程用于处理重要的窗口消息, 如与布局、呈现和输入相关的消息。This window procedure is used to process important window messages, such as those related to layout, rendering, and input. 不过, 您也可以挂钩窗口过程以供自己使用。However, you can also hook the window procedure for your own use. 可以通过设置属性在构造过程中指定自己的挂钩, 也可以在创建窗口后使用和来添加和删除挂钩。You can specify your own hook during construction by setting the property, or you can also use and to add and remove hooks after the window is created. 挂钩按后进先出的顺序调用, 这使得挂钩可以在内置处理之前执行。The hooks are called by last-in first-out order, which enables your hooks to execute before the built-in processing. 实际挂钩由弱引用持有。The actual hooks are held by a weak reference. 因此, 请确保你管理挂钩委托的生存期。Therefore, make sure that you manage the lifetime of your hook delegate. 有关和其他互操作类的详细信息, 请参阅[WPF 和 Win32 互操作](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-and-win32-interoperation.md)。For more information about and other interoperation classes, see [WPF and Win32 Interoperation](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-and-win32-interoperation.md). 请注意, 的构造函数如何获取类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]函数的参数的参数, 如[CreateWindowEx](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=98462)。Notice how the constructors for take parameters that resemble the parameters for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] functions such as [CreateWindowEx](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=98462). 缩放转换不应应用于的。Scale transformations should not be applied to the of an . 请参阅的"备注"。See Remarks for .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.name: parameters
param.span: 包含创建窗口所需的参数的结构。

span.span: A structure that contains the parameters that are required to create the window.

summary.span: 通过使用包含初始设置的结构初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using a structure that contains the initial settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法在 Internet 安全区域中不可用。This method is not available in the Internet security zone. 在某些情况下, 此构造函数签名可能更为方便, 因为默认结构包含一些适当的初始默认值。This constructor signature might be more convenient in certain situations, because the default structure contains some appropriate initial default values. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果使用此签名, 请不要使用默认构造函数来构造`parameters`值的结构。If you use this signature, do not use the default constructor to construct the structure for the `parameters` value. 你必须使用构造函数, 该构造函数使你能够指定初始窗口名称。You must use the constructor that enables you to specify an initial window name. 如果使用默认构造函数, 并使用它创建, 则不会显示, 因为初始窗口名称是所表示的 HWND 的构造要求。If you use the default constructor and create an with it, that does not display because an initial window name is a construction requirement for the represented HWND.

span.span: to acquire Win32 focus for the WPF containing window when the user interacts with menus; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值在通过设置参数创建时设置。This value is set when you create the by setting the parameter. 默认值由属性确定。The default value is determined by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddHook(class System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceHook hook) cil managed

param.name: hook
param.span: 接收窗口消息的处理程序实现（基于 委托）。

span.span: The handler implementation (based on the delegate) that receives the window messages.

summary.span: 添加接收所有窗口消息的事件处理程序。

span.span: Adds an event handler that receives all window messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法在 Internet 安全区域中不可用。This method is not available in the Internet security zone. 到达[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]的大多数消息具有近似[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]等效项。Most [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] messages that reach the have an approximate [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] equivalent. 用于处理消息没有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]等效项的情况。You use to handle the cases where the message has no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] equivalent. 委托类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]主窗口过程的参数配置文件。 The delegate resembles the parameter profile of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] main window procedure. 父窗口的主窗口过程接收的所有窗口消息也将转发到委托。All window messages that the main window procedure of the parent window receives are also forwarded to the delegates. 挂钩按其添加顺序进行调用。Hooks are called in the order that they were added. 如果消息的任何`handled`挂钩返回= `true` , 则不会为该消息调用位于调用顺序中的挂钩。If any hook returns `handled`=`true` for a message, the hooks after it in the call order are not called for that message.

span.span: to add handling.
Associated enumeration:

summary.span: 当布局导致 自动调整大小时发生。

span.span: Occurs when layout causes the to automatically resize.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的本机行为是根据通过布局系统报告的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]更改自动调整内容和窗口区域的大小。The native behavior of is to automatically resize content and the window region based on changes reported through the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] layout system. 如果窗口当前已最小化或者设置为, 则窗口不会调整大小。The window does not resize if it is currently minimized or if is set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用从获取的句柄从[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]代码引用。You can use the handle that is obtained from to reference the from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] code. 使用消息处理和窗口行为等操作的句柄。Use the handle for operations such as message handling and window behavior. 若要仅获取句柄, 请使用。To get just the handle, use .

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的新实例已设置为此默认值, 除非使用属性将其他值作为参数传递给特定实例的构造函数。New instances of have set to this default value, unless a different value is passed as a parameter to the constructor for a specific instance, by using the property.

summary.span: 释放 使用的所有托管资源，并引发 事件。

span.span: Releases all managed resources that are used by the , and raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法在 Internet 安全区域中不可用。This method is not available in the Internet security zone. 为 HWND 启动相关的清理工作。 initiates related cleanup work for the HWND. 如果是通过与主 ui 线程不同的线程调用的, 则清除工作可能会推迟, 直到可以将其发布到主 ui 线程。If is called through a thread that is different from the main UI thread, the cleanup work may be deferred until it can be posted to the main UI thread. 对于某些互操作方案, 可能需要从互操作代码中显式调用, 因为在某些互操作方案中, 可以跨互操作边界生成多个对它的引用这可能会阻止及时的垃圾回收。Calling explicitly from the interoperating code might be necessary for certain interoperation scenarios, because an in some interoperation scenarios can generate several references to it across the interoperation boundaries that might prevent timely garbage collection.

summary.span: 对此对象调用 方法时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the method is called on this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件在由释放任何资源之前引发。 The event is raised before any resources are released by the . 此事件指示引发事件的对象将要删除对它的所有引用。The event indicates that the object that raises the event is about to have all references to it removed. 使用 和属性以避免调用两次 (引发异常)。 Use and the property to avoid calling twice (which raises an exception).

summary.span: 已更改此 Hwnd 的监视器的 DPI 或 Hwnd 移动到具有不同 DPI 的监视器时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the DPI of the monitor of this Hwnd has changed, or the Hwnd is moved to a monitor with a different DPI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法在 Internet 安全区域中不可用, 或者通常用于部分信任。This method is not available in the Internet security zone, or for partial trust in general. 您可以使用此方法为非显式互操作窗口的窗口返回。You can use this method to return an for a window that is not explicitly an interoperation window. 此过程的过程如下:The procedure for this is: 1. 创建实例 (提供 main 作为构造函数参数)。 Create a instance (providing the main as a constructor parameter). 2. 获取该 实例的属性值。Get the value of the property from that instance. 3. 将该 HWND 值作为参数传递给。Pass that HWND value as a parameter to . 如果您想要将常规消息处理添加到窗口, 此方法会很有用。This technique can be useful if you then want to add general message processing to the window. 但是, 无论何时创建, 都要负责销毁它。However, whenever you create an , you are also responsible for destroying it. 即使释放应用程序 的对象, 也是如此。This is true even if the object for an application is disposed. 有关详细信息, 请参阅上的备注。For more information, see Remarks on .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为 HWND 启动相关的清理工作。 initiates related cleanup work for the HWND. 如果是通过与主 ui 线程不同的线程调用的, 则清除工作可能会推迟, 直到可以将其发布到主 ui 线程。If is called through a thread that is different from the main UI thread, the cleanup work may be deferred until it can be posted to the main UI thread. 引发事件, 并在调用后立即 变为`false`的值。 The event is raised and the value of becomes `false` as soon as is called. 在这段时间内, 如果再次调用 , 将引发异常。During this time, if you call again, raises an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可将或另一个根视觉对象连接到。Use this property to connect a or another root visual to the . 缩放转换不应应用于 的, 因为这样可以禁用行为。Scale transformations should not be applied to the of an because this can disable behavior. 内容将会缩放, 但封闭窗口将不会。The content will scale, but the enclosing window will not. 将转换应用到作为的子元素 的对象, 而不是将转换应用于对象。Instead of applying the transformation to the object that is the , apply the transformation to an object that is a child element of the . 为了提供可缩放的对象, 你可能需要将[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]额外的封闭元素添加到内容 (如面板)。You might need to add an extra enclosing element to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content, such as a panel, in order to provide a scaleable object. 可以添加作为根视觉对象, 但仅作为顶级窗口 (使用 WS_OVERLAPPED), 而不是作为子窗口。You can add a as the root visual, but only as a top-level window (with WS_OVERLAPPED), not as a child window.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UsesPerPixelOpacity As Boolean
public: property bool UsesPerPixelOpacity { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值声明是否遵守源窗口内容的每像素不透明度。

span.span: Gets a value that declares whether the per-pixel opacity of the source window content is respected.

value.span: 如果系统使用每像素不透明度，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the system uses per-pixel opacity; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用每像素不透明度时, 系统不再绘制非工作区。When you enable per-pixel opacity, the system no longer draws the non-client area. 这是因为的目标是显示可在互操作方案中使用的非矩形顶级 UI。This is because the intended purpose of is to show non-rectangular top-level UI that works in interoperation scenarios. 因此, 显示矩形非工作区的情况将违背此目的。Therefore, showing the rectangular non-client area defeats that purpose.
